Rasch Measurement Models: An introductory guide Preface

Rasch Measurement Models: An introductory guide Peter Ho 2022-01-14 Preface This book is a work-in-progress. The book aims to provide in-depth instruction on how to conduct a Rasch analysis using Winsteps, Facets and some of the R packages like eRm. Data used in this book have been published in the Leeds data repository. I intend to use R for additional analyses not currently available with Winsteps and Facets. Recent updates to this software now provide some functionality for using R. However, I will try to provide additional examples of how data from Winsteps and Facets can be visualised and analysed with R.
About the Author Peter Ho is a lecturer in Food Processing at the University of Leeds.
